people.name: David Silverman
people.description: David Silverman  is an American animator best known for directing numerous episodes of the animated TV series The Simpsons, as well as The Simpsons Movie.

people.name: Bart Simpson
people.description: Bartholomew JoJo "Bart" Simpson is a fictional character in the American animated television series The Simpsons and part of the Simpson family.

people.name: Grampa Simpson
people.description: Abraham Jedediah  "Abe" Simpson II, often known simply as Grampa, is a fictional character in the animated television series, The Simpsons, he made his first appearance in the episode entitled Grampa and the Kids, a Simpsons short on The Tracey Ullman Show.
